feed.title: Some real-world results about the current Segwit Discount

entry.title: Some real-world results about the current Segwit Discount
entry.summary: In an email thread, Matt expresses his disagreement with Sergio's suggestion regarding Segwit. Although Sergio is limiting himself to changing the parameters of Segwit, Matt argues that even fewer lines of code do not necessarily mean better results. In his opinion, over-optimization in the wrong direction will lead to a poor outcome that may not be accepted by the community.Gregory Maxwell also chimes in, adding some humor to the conversation with a playful "Rawr."
